event_name: The International 2024 Live Event Broadcast RFP and Broadcast License Requests

announcement_body.headline: The International 2024 Live Event Broadcast RFP and Broadcast License Requests
body: The International is heading back to Europe this September, and companies interested in producing and distributing regional language broadcasts of The International 2024 are encouraged to apply now.

We are now accepting proposals for the Live Event Broadcast Production of The International 2024 in Russian, Chinese, and Spanish language broadcasts. The RFP (Request for Proposal) documentation and instructions for submissions can be found [url=https://cdn.cloudflare.steamstatic.com/apps/dota2/assets/RFP_TI_2024_Official.pdf]here[/url].
Please reach out to theinternationalrfp@valvesoftware.com with any additional questions.
For those seeking additional licenses and feeds, please fill out the form that pertains to the correct request:

[*]Production companies seeking a commercial license to produce a regional language broadcast of The International 2024 without additional access to the event can apply [url=https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdgb9HW-xlhGcVhfFFL1RN7ILyCI8WXyzMRvLANB65haUrYKw/viewform]here[/url].

[*]Streaming platforms interested in restreaming the official broadcast feeds to their platform can apply [url=https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeNdTGbw8wRkHChG75eUkzhzIJvDCGZmskYiURLO0CXm-RHjA/viewform]here[/url].
Thanks in advance to everyone interested in working with us to make The International 2024 the best yet.
